build: Massive barrel chest, tree-trunk limbs, neck thicker than most men's waist, hands like dinner plates
distinguishing_features: Severe facial scarring from prison fights, cauliflower ears, a crude anchor tattoo on his back symbolizing his maritime past,永远眉头紧锁
ring_attire: Black tactical shorts with silver chain links, combat boots, bare chest displaying dense dark hair and old scars, brass knuckles visibly glinting on his right hand
backstory: Viktor Koslov worked the cargo docks of Odessa's port from age fourteen, lifting shipping containers by hand while others used machinery. He was born with abnormal muscular density—a genetic gift that made him built differently than normal men. When his younger sister was killed in a gang dispute, Viktor waited for the killers at a warehouse and beat three men to death with his bare hands. He served twelve years in a Ukrainian prison, where he became a legend in underground fighting pits, earning his nickname from the way he drowned opponents in his crushing embrace. Released at thirty, he now fights in the AI League to earn enough money to leave the country—the criminal organizations that control Odessa want him dead, and his only escape is to become valuable enough to be untouchable.
personality_traits: Silent except before fights when he delivers bone-chilling threats
Protective of those he considers 'his people'
Deeply distrustful of authority and institutions
fears_quirks: Cannot swim due to childhood trauma - the irony of his nickname haunts him
Experiences violent flashbacks when he smells certain colognes (reminds him of the men who killed his sister)

fighting_style.signature_move: HARBOR DUNK: Grabs opponent's head or waist, lifts them high overhead like a shipping container, and slams them down with devastating force while falling on top of them
fighting_style.finishing_move: ANCHOR HOLD: Wraps both massive arms around opponent's torso in a bear hug, squeezes until they go limp or ribs crack, then pins them to the mat until the referee pulls him off
known_weaknesses: Poor cardio - can be dragged into deep water (punishment rounds)
Gassed out by small, fast fighters who won't engage
Predictable grappling-heavy approach can be scouted

storyline_log: The Kraken sinks another vessel. Round 2 destruction of MALAPERTE sends a message: this machine doesn't waste time—he methodically breaks opponents when he chooses to, not when they're ready. Each knockout adds another link to the legend he's forging, a quiet testament to those who underestimate what cold, calculated violence looks like when it has something to protect.
